meanings.definition: The activity of traveling in a kayak.
meanings.sent1: Kayaking is a fun way to explore rivers and lakes.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy kayaking on the calm waters of the lake.
meanings.sent3: When I went kayaking, I accidentally splashed my friend with water!
meanings.sent4: Her kayak glided through the water like a graceful swan.
meanings.sent5: The sun glistened on the surface of the water as I went kayaking.

meanings.definition: To engage in the sport of kayaking.
meanings.sent1: We are planning to go kayaking this weekend.
meanings.sent2: She loves kayaking down the river rapids.
meanings.sent3: I was so excited about kayaking that I couldn't sleep the night before!
meanings.sent4: His determination in kayaking is as strong as a raging river.
meanings.sent5: The sound of paddles slicing through the water filled the air during kayaking.
